name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior PHP Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess extensive expertise in **PHP**, **Magento**, **Alpine.js**, and **Laravel** for building scalable web applications. I have successfully led projects utilizing **Livewire**, **PHPUnit**, and **JIRA** for efficient project management and development workflows, ensuring high-quality deliverables in fast-paced environments. My technical proficiency also includes **React** for frontend development and seamless integration with backend services through API design.

In addition to my PHP proficiency, I have a solid background in cloud services with **AWS**, which enhances deployment and performance scalability. I leverage best practices in CI/CD, testing, and version control with **Git** to maintain robust applications. My strengths include a strong analytical mindset and the ability to work collaboratively within cross-functional teams, continuously delivering innovative solutions that drive business success.
